title: Elisa D'Ovidio
text:
Elisa D'Ovidio (born 24 February 1989) is an Australian <a href="Association%20football">soccer</a> player who last played for Australian <a href="W-League%20%28Australia%29">W-League</a> team <a href="Perth%20Glory%20FC%20W-League">Perth Glory</a> between 2008 and 2015.
In 2006, D'Ovidio was adjudged the "Fairest and Best" player in the <a href="Football%20West">Football West</a> Women's Premier League.
In 2016, she was selected as assistant Coach of the Western Australian Women's State Team for a match against <a href="Perth%20Glory%20FC%20%28W-League%29">Perth Glory Women</a>.
